title: Hell's On Earth
description: It's been a year since Beau, Edgar and Gabe went to earth and found themselves in a battle to protect Heaven and East Lake. A year since Beau and Emma fell in love. Almost a year since Beau had to go back to Heaven and the last time Emma saw him. Long distance relationships are hard enough but, when you live in two different dimensions and only one of you is flesh the odds are stacked against you.
author: Anna Andrews
